turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need help managing my bank account. I want to check my balance.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help with that. To check your balance, please provide the last four digits of your account number.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, they are 1234. What's my balance?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. Your current balance is $1,234.56. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, actually. I was charged a $25 overdraft fee yesterday. I'm frustrated because I thought I had enough money. Can you tell me what transactions caused the overdraft?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Yes, I can look up the transactions that led to the overdraft. Please give me a moment to access that information... Okay, it looks like a $50 withdrawal at a grocery store and a $100 transfer to another account were processed on the day before your balance went below zero, triggering the overdraft fee.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, that's weird. I don't remember withdrawing $50 at a grocery store. Can you provide more specific details, like the name of the store and the exact time of the transaction?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am currently unable to retrieve the exact time of the transaction for security reasons. However, I can tell you the grocery store was 'Food Mart'. Would you like me to check if there are any similar transactions around that time?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, that would be great, thanks. Let's see if we can figure this out, because I am almost certain I didn't make that transaction.
